name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
description: The Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra features a 6.8-inch AMOLED display, a 200MP camera, and top-tier performance with the latest processors. It offers a sleek design, AI enhancements, and 5G support.

name: iPhone 16 Pro Max
description: The iPhone 16 Pro Max boasts a larger, ProMotion OLED display, powerful A17 Bionic chip, and advanced camera system with improved low-light capabilities. It combines sleek design with top-tier performance and 5G support, offering an exceptional user experience.

name: Pixel 9 Pro XL
